LanguageData.WDYS.MarketValue: Market value. This doesn't take into account your potential colonist price impact.
LanguageData.WDYS.Pawn: {0} is your best trader ({1} improvement). Price will be showed according to this.
LanguageData.WDYS.NeedTradeConsoleUI: You need a powered trade console to receive trade stock information
LanguageData.WDYS.ResetToolTip: Reset window.\n(This is not done automatically for performance reasons)
LanguageData.WDYS.OnlyIndustrial: Only industrial and higher tech level faction can send you their trade stock information
LanguageData.WDYS.NeedTradeConsole: You need a trade console to receive trade stock information
LanguageData.WDYS.MaxDays: Only get trade stock of settlement {0} tiles or less away from the negotiator settlement/caravan
LanguageData.WDYS.OnlyShowReachable: Only show reachable settlement trade stock
